c74object.name: whichoffset
c74object.digest: Calculates the optimal offset for a set of bars
c74object.description: The `whichoffset` object analyzes a set of bar timestamps for a given track and determines the optimal global offset to minimize the "excess" time before and after the note sequence.

inlet.description: - bang: Sends the current dictionary content to the visualizer (only if @visualize is enabled). - int: Sets the current track number. - span [list]: Receives a list of bar timestamps and calculates the optimal offset.

outlet.description: Outputs the calculated optimal offset in milliseconds.
If the log attribute is enabled, this outlet provides status messages.

objarg.name: dictionary-name
objarg.digest: Name of the dictionary to analyze

attribute.name: log
attribute.description: When enabled (1), creates an additional outlet for status information.

attribute.name: visualize
attribute.description: When enabled (1), the object sends JSON data to the connected visualization script.
